items.name: Kathal Masala
items.description: Jackfruit cooked with onions, spices, ginger, garlic, chilles and fresh coriander
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Reshmi Chicken
items.description: Chicken marinated with yogurt, spices and cream and cooked in rich flavourful thick gravy
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 paratha + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Bread Pakoda
items.description: Bread stuffed with spicy mashed potato stuffing and coated with chickpea batter and fried to perfection. Served with spicy green chutney.

items.name: Tamarind rice
items.description: Rice mixed with tamarind juice, peanut and spices, topped with curry leaves. Served with papad.

items.name: Paneer Makhni
items.description: Creamy buttery gravy made with onion, tomato, cashew, garlic & ginger in a thick gravy with soft cottage cheese cubes
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Chicken Dhansak
items.description: A wholesome meal of chicken thigh, lentils,vegetables and spices cooked together and made into a complete comfort meal.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 paratha or rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Sweetpotato Tikki Chaat
items.description: Mashed sweetpotato mixed with onion, chiilies, spices and coated with bread crumbs and shallow fried and smired with  chickpea curry, topped with sweet, tangy and spicy chutney, sev and pomagrante seeds.

items.name: Palak Paneer Theplas
items.description: Grated Indian cottage cheese and blanced spinach puree mixed into a whole wheat dough and to make a delicious flat breads. Served with tangy spicy tomato onion chutney. (3 theplas)

items.name: Dahiwale Aloo
items.description: Boiled potatoes marinated with spices, roasted and cooked in a flavourful spiced yogurt gravy
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Malabar Prawns Curry
items.description: A Lip Smacking dish from Malabar region. Prawns cooked with onion, ginger, garlic and rich coconut milk and topped with fresh corriander.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 paratha or rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Bhel Puri
items.description: Street style snack of puffed rice mixed with spicy chutney, sweet tangy chutney, papadi, sev, onion, tomato and fresh coriander making it a flavourful snack.

items.name: Oats and Rava Idli
items.description: Steamed cakes made of oats and semolina (granulated wheat) mixed with yogurt, onion, cashew and chilles. Served with coconut chutney.

items.name: Gatte Ki Sabzi
items.description: A traditional Rajasthani curry with chickpea flour dumplings cooked in spicy yogurt based gravy.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Champaran Lamb Curry
items.description: A dish from the nothern part of India with spicy flavourful lamb pieces cooked together with spices, chillies, garlic, ginger and fresh ground spies, slow cooked on low flame to perfection.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas/rice + side salad + achar

items.name: Vada pav
items.description: A famous veggie burger from the streets of Mumbai. The patty is made of boiled potatoes mixed with spices, coated in chickpea flour and fried to perfection. This is stuffed in a bun smeared with spicy green chutney and dry garlic chutney. (2 vada pav)

items.name: Puttu And Kadala Curry
items.description: A comforting meal made of steamed rice flour layered with coconut and served with spicy warm black chickpea curry

items.name: Navratna pulao
items.description: Assorted vegetables, cashew & rasins cooked together with fragrant basmati rice and spices. served with yogurt raita+ papad + achar

items.name: Maharashrian Chicken Thali
items.description: A Maharashtrian style feast of chicken dishes, salad, chapati, rice, pickle, papad and a refreshing coconut drink. The thali consists of  malvani chicken gravy, chicken sukka, chicken in green gravy, solkadi, rice, 2 chapati and koshimbir (side salad).

items.name: Bombay Cheese Chilli Toast
items.description: Famous Mumbai style grilled sandwich with spicy stuffing and loads of cheese. Perfect for an evening snack

items.name: Bisli Bhat
items.description: Rice cooked with veggies, onion, tomato, chillies and spices; stir fried and tempered with mustard seeds and peanuts. Served with papad.

items.name: Burnt Garlic Fried Rice
items.description: Indo-Chinese dish made with assorted veggies and rice cooked in chinese sauces and topped with crispy burnt garlic flakes.
items.extra: make it more delicious with a side of paneer in soy basil sauce

items.name: Chicken Burnt Garlic Fried Rice
items.description: Indo-Chinese dish with assorted veggies, boneless chicken and rice cooked in chinese sauces and topped with crispy burnt garlic flakes.
items.extra: make it more delicious with a side of chicken manchurian gravy

items.name: Ragada Patice
items.description: Mashed potatoes patty crispy fried and served with green pea churry smiriled with tangy, sweet and spicy chutney.

items.name: One Pot Chicken Rice
items.description: Chicken marinated with ginger & garlic paste and spices pan roasted in ghee and cooked together with onion, rice, coconut milk and flavourful spices

items.name: Panner Lababdar
items.description: Indian cottage cheese cooked with onion, tomato, ginger, garlic and cashew nut paste
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Pahadi Chicken Curry
items.description: A dish from the State of Himachal In India. Chicken cooked with yogurt, onion and frishly roasted and ground whole spices. A chicken curry from the mountains of India.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Kathi Roll
items.description: Flaky egg paratha, cucumber, pickled onions, lime juice wrapped into a pefect roll. Served with green spicy chutney.

items.name: Palak Paneer Paratha
items.description: Spinach and Indian cottage cheese pureeded and mixed in whole wheat dough with spices and rolled into a flatbread cooked on a hot pan. Served with tomato and onion tangy chutney. (4 parathas)

items.name: Kashmiri Dum Aloo
items.description: Baby potatoes boiled, roasted and cooked in flavourful yogurt based gravy. A dish from the beautiful state of Kashmir.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Rogan Josh
items.description: A Kashmiri dish where lamb meat is slowed cooked and added to a base of yogurt, spices, and onions. A warm and flavourful dish.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Chicken Mayo Sandwitch
items.description: Chicken mixed with mayo, salt and pepper and stuffed in between bread. Served with tomato ketchup

items.name: Lemon Rice
items.description: Rice, cashews, chillies and other spices stir fried together and mixed with lime juice. Served with achar and papad

items.name: Mamar Chotpoti
items.description: Dried white peas cooked with tamrind, freshly grounded Chotpoti spices and topped with freshly cut coriander leaves
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Korai Ghost
items.description: Slow cooked meat with onion, tomato, ginger, garlic and spices cooked to prefection so that the meat will fall of the bone.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Sweet Potato Patty
items.description: Full of fiber and nutrients, sweet potato mixed with herbs and spices and made into a patty and shallow fried. Served with spicy green chutney.

items.name: Tamarind rice
items.description: Rice mixed with tamarind juice, peanut and spices, topped with curry leaves. Served with papad.

items.name: Tawa Paneer
items.description: A popular dish in every Indian resturant. Indian cottage cheese cooked in spicy flavourful gravy made with freshly ground spices and topped with onion and capsicum petals.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Chicken Changezi
items.description: Chicken marinated and cooked with yogurt, cream, onion, tomato, ginger, garlic and lots of fresh spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad

items.name: Paneer Schezwan Frankie
items.description: Spicy paneer cooked with chinese sauces, wrapped in roti with onion, cabbage and frankie masala. A perfect spicy snack. Served with schezwan chutney for an extra kick

items.name: Appams & Mutta Curry
items.description: A classic dish from the state of Kerala. Rice pancakes steamed and served with spicy, lip smacking egg curry cooked in a base of coconut milk.

items.name: Khumb Pudina Pulao
items.description: Mushroom and mint pulao with chilli, turmeric and fried onions made in freshly ground spices. A perfect comforting meal. Served with yougurt raita + papad + achar.

items.name: Shahi Rezala
items.description: Lamb meat  slow cooked with caramalised onions, cashew, yogurt, milk and spices with ginger and garlic and topped with fresh coriander
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad

items.name: Oats & Rava Unniappams
items.description: Oats flour and semolina, onions, tempered with different spices and fried as small round balls. Served with coconut chutney. (7 unniappams)

items.name: Puttu & Kadala
items.description: Steamed rice flour layered with fresh grated coconut and served with spicy flavourful black chickpea curry

items.name: Veg thali
items.description: A complete feast for vegetarians with a lot of different flavours  and dishes. The veg thali consists of 2 curry items, 1 dal, 1 side salad, rice, 2 chapati, papad, achar, raita.

items.name: Seafood Thali
items.description: A feast for sea food lovers. Mackerel fry, dry prawns curry, fish curry, koshimbir, achar, rice, 2 chapati and solkadi

items.name: Veg Schezwan Frankie
items.description: Boiled potato mashed and shallow fried and stuffed in whole wheat flatbread with onion, frankie masala and rolled in to a wrap. Served with green chutney.

items.name: Chicken Schezwan Frankie
items.description: Chicken cooked with flavourful spices, onion, capcicum and spicy schezwan sauce and fresh frankie masala and rolled in a wrap. Served with spicy frankie chutney
